Univariate Distributions
========================

Functionality for univariate distribution fitting and testing. It includes methods for kernel density estimation, goodness-of-fit tests, and various statistical tests.

Distibution fitting
-------------------

.. automodule:: funcsim
   :members: compare, fit
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:


Goodness-of-fit tests
---------------------

.. automodule:: funcsim
   :no-index:
   :members: kstest, adtest, cvmtest, swtest, utests
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:


Distibution representations
---------------------------

.. automodule:: funcsim
   :no-index:
   :members: Kde
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
